title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] Bring Your Own Agents and Tools to AWS Transform (MAM208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] 将您自己的代理和工具引入 AWS Transform (MAM208)
abstract: Ready to take your AI agents to the next level in cloud migration? AWS Transform, the first agentic AI service for cloud migration and modernization, now enables seamless integration of custom AI agents, specialized tools, and knowledge bases through its composable transformations feature. Join this lightning talk to discover how AWS Professional Service and migration competency partners are combining their proprietary AI agents with AWS Transform to create uniquely tailored solutions. Whether you're building or using AI agents for migration automation, learn how to leverage this game-changing feature to accelerate your modernization journey.
abstract_cn: 准备将您的AI代理提升到云迁移的新高度？AWS Transform是首个用于云迁移和现代化的代理式AI服务，现在通过其可组合转换功能实现了自定义AI代理、专业工具和知识库的无缝集成。参加这个闪电演讲，了解AWS专业服务和迁移能力合作伙伴如何将其专有AI代理与AWS Transform相结合，创建独特定制的解决方案。无论您是在构建还是使用AI代理进行迁移自动化，都可以学习如何利用这一改变游戏规则的功能来加速您的现代化之旅。
